Summary: A big lightning flash about 500 feet up, and then subsequent flashes at great distances apart in split seconds.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around August 25th 2004
divs: Sighting Details In August of 2004, I went backpacking with my Aunt, cousin and her two friends to Upper Lena Lake in the Olympic Mountains, on the Olympic Penninsula in Washington State, USA. On the second night of the trip, we were all looking at the stars on a clear evening, when there was a flash like lightning and we saw a large triangular object about 500 to 1000 feet above us, and then in a split second it was gone, and there was another flash very far away, and then three more flashes further and further away in a split second. It was like a plane took off and in the blink of a eye went from right above you to one thousand miles away. We all witnessed it and were a little shocked. I realized it couldn't have been anything from this planet's current technology, and one of my companions said, "I didn't just see that" to which I replied, "yes you did, we all did".
